reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

description.narrative: - Meeting human needs and drawing a smile on the faces of orphans, widows and destitute people. - Participate in paying suffering to the poor and the needy. Distributing 2 blankets with a winter bag containing socks, gloves and a winter hat for each needy family to keep them from the cold in 21 regions in four regions.

- Securing, transporting and distributing blankets and winter bags to the warehouse of the implementing partner in Baluchistan, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Kashmir Free and Gilgat Balistan. - Transfer the approved quantity of bags and blankets from the partner’s warehouses to the targeted areas and distribute them to the beneficiaries who were chosen in the four provinces of Baluchistan, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Kashmir Free and Jaljat Balestan

• Delivery of 60,000 blankets and 30,000 bags to the implementing partner, whereby 2 blankets + a winter bag are distributed to each family in the following areas: 7,500 families in Jaljest-Balestan province 7,500 families in Free Kashmir 8,000 families in the Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Territory 7,000 families in Balochistan province
